And not to mention the crucial investments in our children! It will create universal, free pre-k. It will cap childcare costs, invest in free school meals, and expand Head Start.

I have introduced legislation to put our artists back to work and legislation to help our legacy fossil fuel workers. With the Build Back Better Framework, we will be able to help our workers with new grants to expand training and career services.

As a member of the Ed & Labor committee, I pushed for more investment in workforce development and higher education funds. The BBB framework will increase the maximum Pell Grant awards, provide additional funding for MSIs and TCUs, and make higher ed more accessible.
